pages.text: Instead of using regular clay, you can make bricks out of loose stones.
pages.title: The Brick
Bricks
pages.text: To make brick blocks, you need $(3)mortar$(). 500mB of Fresh Water and a Flux makes 500mB of Limewater. Seal a sand in 100mB of Limewater to make 16 mortar.
You can also make bricks out of clay, by knapping clay bricks and heating them. The same goes for $(l:advanced_metalworking/fire_clay)fire bricks$()
pages.title: Vanilla Bricks
